content: ends for the second square chain 1 and single_crochet the two squares together at each chain 2 corner gap single_crochet chain 2 single_crochet tie off and weave in end tail use color b chain 30 with a long tail for sewing sl 2 to corner of square single_crochet 30 back tie off leaving a long tail for sewing assembly using color c sew the two halves of the head together stuff when most of the way around using the tails sew the horns to the head matching the colors using the tail on the neck sew the body to the head try to align the nose with one of the points on the neck but don t worry about being perfect using the tails sew on the legs with the top row around row 11 and the bottom around row 2 for stiffer legs stuff the skinny part stuff the hips using the tails sew on the arms for stiffer ones stuff them using the tails sew on the tail stitch on the eyes using color c embroider a circle around the neck and a matching motif on the thighs additional embroidery can be done on the horns also embroider an edging around the motif on the tail
